name: Cargo Quest
description:
Made for Epic Mega Jam 2020!

This game was made within the 7 days given to us for the Jam!

   Aim of the game   

Deliver as much cargo as you can without running out of fuel canisters!

   Controls   

Move = WASD

Roll = E/Q

Select Cargo = Left mouse

Thrust = Left Shift

Slow down = Left Ctrl

   Credit   

Programming, most editor use and Art by me dscottwilson.itch.io

Gameplay design, Art and particles by niallcrabtree.itch.io
